title: MR and P in perfect and monopolistic competition

content.question: Which of the following about the relationship between marginal revenue (MR) and price (P) under monopolistic competition and perfect competition is correct?

choices.label: Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR>P MR=P
Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR
Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR decreases when P increases MR increases when P decreases
Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR=P MR=P
Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR=P MR<P

content.answer: Monopolistic Competition Perfect Competition MR

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
